nodes.text: The Unchained, or "Slave Cult", was a group of slaves among those who rebelled against the reconstituted Sith Empire at the unfinished colossus on Dromund Kaas during the Cold War. Led by Traga un-Vhol, the slaves believed they could become Sith by following a twisted version of Sith philosophy. They killed other slaves, knowing that their rebellion was foolish.
